languages.text: "Тебя не искрошили в куски лишь потому, что эттфатер решил{mf||а} завести ручного ксеноса. Так что, немочь поганая, помалкивай, пока я тебя не заткнул".
"The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So, shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."
languages.original_text: "Тебя не искрошили в куски лишь потому, что эттфатер решил{mf||а} завести ручного ксеноса. Так что, немочь поганая, помалкивай, пока я тебя не заткнул".

traits.locale_text: "The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."
"The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."
"The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."
"The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."

languages.text: “你之所以没有被撕成碎片，不过是因为狼领打算养只异形当宠物而已。闭嘴吧，可怜虫，否则我帮你闭上。”
languages.original_text: "The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So, shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: “你之所以没有被撕成碎片，不过是因为狼领打算养只异形当宠物而已。闭嘴吧，可怜虫，否则我帮你闭上。”

languages.text: « Si vous êtes encore en un seul morceau, c'est parce que l'aett-vater a décidé de vous garder comme xénos domestique. Alors, fermez votre sale clapet, résidu de basse-fosse, ou je m'en chargerai pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So, shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous êtes encore en un seul morceau, c'est parce que l'aett-vater a décidé de vous garder comme xénos domestique. Alors, fermez votre sale clapet, résidu de basse-fosse, ou je m'en chargerai pour vous. »

languages.text: «La única razón por la que no te he despedazado es porque a mi Aett-Vater le ha entrado el antojo de tener un xenos mascota. Así que cierra el pico antes de que te lo cierre yo, espantajo».
languages.original_text: "The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So, shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: «La única razón por la que no te he despedazado es porque a mi Aett-Vater le ha entrado el antojo de tener un xenos mascota. Así que cierra el pico antes de que te lo cierre yo, espantajo».

languages.text: 「お前が細切れ肉にされない理由はただひとつ、アエット＝ヴァテルが異種族を飼うと決めたからだ。わかったら口を閉じろ、弱っちい悪党め。俺が代わりに閉じてやろうか」
languages.original_text: "The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So, shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が細切れ肉にされない理由はただひとつ、アエット＝ヴァテルが異種族を飼うと決めたからだ。わかったら口を閉じろ、弱っちい悪党め。俺が代わりに閉じてやろうか」

languages.text: "Ihr wurdet nur deshalb nicht in Stücke gerissen, weil der Aett-Vater entschieden hat, sich einen Xenos als Haustier zu halten. Also haltet den Mund, Wurm, sonst schließe ich ihn für Euch."
languages.original_text: "The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So, shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wurdet nur deshalb nicht in Stücke gerissen, weil der Aett-Vater entschieden hat, sich einen Xenos als Haustier zu halten. Also haltet den Mund, Wurm, sonst schließe ich ihn für Euch."

languages.original_text: "The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."

languages.text: "Şu anda paramparça olmamanın tek sebebi, Aett-Vater'ın kendine evcil bir zeno sahiplenmek istemesi. O yüzden ben çeneni yerinden sökmeden sen kapatıver besleme."
languages.original_text: "The only reason why you were not ripped to pieces is because the Aett-Vater decided to take on a pet xenos. So, shut your mouth, puny wretch, before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: "Şu anda paramparça olmamanın tek sebebi, Aett-Vater'ın kendine evcil bir zeno sahiplenmek istemesi. Yani ben çeneni yerinden sökmeden sen kapatıver cılız pislik."
